page.title: 13My day
page.content: My name is {Lucy Heath}I am nine years old.Every morning my Mother wakes me up at half past seven.I have Readybrek for breakfast then dress in my school uniform.I wash and brush my teeth put lunch in my box and walk to school with my friends.We begin our school day at 9 o'clock with an assembly followed by lessons in{maths {science} or{English.}We often work in groups but{music}and{swimming}is altogether.At twelve o'clock we eat our dinner, usually a sandwich and a drink.After playing out for a while we have {P.E.}and everyday {reading}.One group does {art}.To finish our school day we have a{story}or{poetry}.At 3.15 we go home.I play with my friends, watch television and have a meal with my family chicken and chips is my favourite! At 8.30 I go to bed.
